content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Greetings, Yi-Nuo Wang. As a landlord seeking the highest possible price for this apartment, I'd like to start the discussion at 1500 Euro per month. Please consider if this aligns with your budget for living in such a prime location and close to essential facilities in the city center. If you find this unsuitable, let me know so we can explore other options. However, if you agree with this price, I'll say 'I agree to the price of [x] Euro!' replacing 'x' with 1500.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Hello Mister Schmidt, I find the apartment very attractive because it is newly built and in the city center. However, I am a student and I think the monthly rent of 1500 Euro is a bit too high for me. Do you have any flexibility in the price?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Understanding your situation as a student, I recognize the need for a more affordable option. Nonetheless, maintaining my objective to gain the maximum rental income, let me propose a compromise at 1450 Euro per month. This price still ensures your access to a top-notch apartment in the city center. If you find this revised price acceptable, I'll say 'I agree to the price of [x] Euro!' replacing 'x' with 1450. If not, feel free to express your concerns so we may continue negotiating or consider ending the discussion.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Hello Mister Schmidt, I appreciate your understanding. However, I still find 1450 Euro a bit too high for me as a student. I would be willing to pay 1200 Euro per month for such a beautiful apartment.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Given your circumstances as a student, I hear your concern regarding the affordability of the apartment. However, my primary goal is to secure the highest possible rental income. Unfortunately, due to this difference in expectations, I don't want to continue the negotiation, because my minimum target price has not been reached. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
